title: THOUGHT / MAGNESIUM BASED LIFE FORM
description:
MAGNESIUM BASED LIFE FORM INITIATION

triggered in Cuno dialogue; as an Obsession!

dialogueTree.title: Composure: "Hear that? Magnesium. That's what y..."
dialogueTree.text: Hear that? Magnesium. That's what you're lacking. The lack of magnesium has you slouched.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "The magnesium levels in your blood..."
links.text: The magnesium levels in your blood are dangerously low. It's about the low magnesium levels and *not* the high alcohol levels.

links.title: You: "I fucking knew it wasn't the alcoho..."
links.text: I fucking knew it wasn't the alcohol... or the other things.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Yeah, the other things! Long live t..."
links.text: Yeah, the other things! Long live the other things! Made you strong as an ox, they have.

links.title: You: "So there's a lack of magnesium in m..."
links.text: So there's a lack of magnesium in me?

links.title: Composure: "Yes, and it's critical. Look at you..."
links.text: Yes, and it's critical. Look at yourself. You're practically devolving into a fish due to the lack of magnesium in you bloodstream.

links.title: You: "I need to Mag it up?"
links.text: I need to Mag it up?

links.title: Composure: "You need to get *SO* magged up! You..."
links.text: You need to get *SO* magged up! You've probably had two heart attacks and a minor stroke already... and the only prescription is insane amounts of magnesium.

links.title: Endurance: "One stroke? Don't be so modest. He'..."
links.text: One stroke? Don't be so modest. He's having one right now.

links.title: You: "You're saying... I need to become a..."
links.text: You're saying... I need to become a Magnesium-Based Lifeform?

links.title: Composure: "Yes. If you want to live, you need..."
links.text: Yes. If you want to live, you need to *evolve*. You need to transcend the carbon barrier. Go to the apothecary and buy insane amounts of magnesium -- it will reverse the damage to your circulatory system.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Just remember -- it's not the alcoh..."
links.text: Just remember -- it's not the alcohol. Buy more of that too. Alcohol is *not* the problem.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "And it's certainly not the dextroam..."
links.text: And it's certainly not the dextroamphetamine.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Nor pyrholidon, that sweet, sweet p..."
links.text: Nor pyrholidon, that sweet, sweet psychoactive radiation drug.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Nor smoking for forty years. It's t..."
links.text: Nor smoking for forty years. It's the lack of magnesium. And excess of coffee. You should stop drinking coffee. It wreaks havoc on your gastrointestinal system.

links.title: You: "I need is to stop thinking about th..."
links.text: I need is to stop thinking about this. [Discard thought.]

links.title: You: "So I need to Mag it sideways?"
links.text: So I need to Mag it sideways?

links.title: Composure: "Mag it sideways? What are you talki..."
links.text: Mag it sideways? What are you talking about?! You need to Mag it *up*! You've probably had two heart attacks and a minor stroke already... and the only prescription is insane amounts of magnesium.

links.title: You: "My magnesium level is fine. [Discar..."
links.text: My magnesium level is fine. [Discard thought.]
